events.description: Overseeing the development and implementation of the federal government strategy, aligning efforts to achieve the objectives of the UAE National Agenda, and ensuring the highest level of government performance.
supporting_quotes: His Excellency Mohammad bin Abdullah Al Gergawi is the Minister of Cabinet Affairs in the UAE Government since 2006.

His duties include overseeing the development and implementation of the federal government strategy, aligning efforts to achieve the objectives of the UAE National Agenda, and ensuring the highest level of government performance.
